desc: Published Node.js command line developer tool that automates writing and managing Redux code. Connects React component to Redux store with the React-Redux library using Babel parsing.   My contribution: Designed and implemented global command line methods; diffing routine to update store from yml file; asynchronous Mocha/Chai testing process to simulate command line inputs to the program and validate results; Babel parsing functionality.
Technologies: Node.js, Babel, Redux, React, Mocha/Chai, AWS EC2/S3

desc: React Native iPad dashboard tool that helps teachers organize social emotional learning in the classroom. My contribution: bootstrapped React Native project and completed dependency installation and collaboration workflow with team member. Translated UX wireframes and visual design into React Native style API. Helped design total application structure. Pair programmed with team member.

React fullstack application that displays portfolio and stock prices in real time. Backend api in Golang, using PostgreSQL and Redis caching. Stateless authentication with JSON Web Tokens. Simulated ‚ÄúACID‚Äù trade SQL transaction with prepared statements.
Technologies: Golang, Redis, React, PostgreSQL, JWT, AWS EC2, socket.io, IEX API, bcrypt

desc: Open source driver to connect an Ableton Live session to Node.js server in real-time, utilizing socket.io and Max/MSP. Library included in Max/MSP‚Äôs example github repo, üåüstarredüåü by developers on four continents.

desc: React data visualization tool to render concepts contained within texts as graph structure. Deployed fullstack web application displays Hegel's Science of Logic, with ~5000 vertices and ~350,000 edges.
Technologies: React, D3 (react-force-graph), Node.js/Express, PM2, PostgreSQL, AWS EC2, Webpack

desc: Utilized Python Machine Learning library to swap the face of a woman in a cell phone video with Jennifer Lopez. ML training completed on AWS Deep Learning EC2 and S3. Wrote extended README detailing training process. Utilized Scrapy library to source 5000+ photographs from JLo fansites. Extensive use of Bash scripting to automate procedures on remote machine and video processing.
Technologies: Python, Scrapy, Flask, AWS EC2/S3, Linux, Bash scripting

desc: React/SASS application, static deployed to an S3.
